name: Wond3r
description:
It's my entry to the 2018 Game Maker's Toolkit Jam!

Wond3r, a RHYTHM game without BUTTON PROMPTS.

You can play it with your eyes closed!

You can read ahead if you want to learn the notes faster than trial and error, but you'll only get half points!

If you're really having trouble, try focusing on one hand during each playthrough. You don't lose points for missing notes, only playing the wrong ones!

Press R to reset.

Dedicated to Stevie Wonder:

"Just because a man lacks the use of his eyes doesn't mean he lacks vision".
